title: Dynamic preference curse
body: Played solo for 20 or more games. In my promos for gold 1. Play five dynamic games in a row go down In rank to 0 lp go from solo preference to dynamic. I go  back to playing solo, play 15 games win most of them to go up to gold 1, almost in plat now, still dynamic preference... Why is that I have Probably 50 solo games but then i play five dynamic doesn't  even boost me and now i am dynamic preference ROIT pls help me.

replies.body:
Ranked Emblems will show for the game type you've won the **vast majority** of your ranked games within the last 25 wins. I recommend winning a bit more Solo games to see if that nifty Solo Ranked Emblem pops up for you.

Check out our [Ranked Emblem FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems) for additional deets. Let me know if you have any questions.
Of my last 25 wins, 20 are solo queue, and 5 are dynamic. Is 80% not vast majority?

[The FAQ that I linked](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066) goes over the calculation formula on how the Emblems are determined. Based on that formula, a few more solo wins in your last 25 wins should net you the solo ranked emblem.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
